source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a minimalist scenery shot capturing the tiled floor of a basin or pool submerged under still, murky water. A grid of dark, greenish-grey tiles, viewed from a high, slightly distorted perspective, dominates the frame, with a subtle, irregular patch of disturbed water or a wet stain visible near the center. There is no main subject in the conventional sense. The focus is instead on the eerie atmosphere created by the dim, green-tinged lighting and the abstract quality of the submerged textures.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
delete "or pool submerged under still, murky water"

A grid of dark, greenish-grey tiles -> explain this "the tiles are white, the color of the light reflected on the water make it look greenish"

irregular patch of disturbed water or a wet stain visible near the center -> irregular patch is located on the tiles near the center
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback:
Please remove the phrase "or pool submerged under still, murky water" from the caption.

Regarding the description of the tiles, it would be more accurate to state: "The tiles are white, but the color of the light reflected on the water gives them a greenish appearance."

Additionally, the phrase "irregular patch of disturbed water or a wet stain visible near the center" should be revised to specify that "the irregular patch is located on the tiles near the center."

Additionally, the phrase "irregular patch of disturbed water or a wet stain visible near the center" should be revised to specify that "the irregular patch is located on the tiles near the center."
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a minimalist scenery shot capturing the tiled floor of a basin. A grid of dark, greenish-grey tiles, viewed from a high, slightly distorted perspective, dominates the frame, with a subtle, irregular patch located on the tiles near the center. The tiles are white, but the color of the light reflected on the water gives them a greenish appearance. There is no main subject in the conventional sense. The focus is instead on the eerie atmosphere created by the dim, green-tinged lighting and the abstract quality of the submerged textures.

revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a minimalist scenery shot capturing the tiled floor of a basin. A grid of white tiles, which appear greenish due to the color of the light reflected on the water, is viewed from a high, slightly distorted perspective and dominates the frame. An irregular patch is located on the tiles near the center. Additionally, a faint reflection of a tree branch can be seen on the water’s surface. The focus is on the eerie atmosphere created by the dim, green-tinged lighting and the abstract quality of the submerged textures.
